name: Bus Skill - Mission Parking
description:
Bus Skill - Mission Parking is to accept parking challenges and take a ride on different city roads.It is a challenge for you to park a coach in parking space!riving a party bus in the city adventure is very difficult task. Show your driving skills and park the turbo bus in the parking lot within a limited time. Get the experience of real driving with a city bus.
eatures:
Excellent HD graphics of Panama decision bus
Background sound effects
New gear with turbo fast speed
New airport buses to select
Easy and smooth steering controls
